row.abstract: W(illelmo) archiepiscopo Tarraconensi, ap. sed. legato, asserit „honorem illum, quem Raimundus, quondam comes Barcinonensis, in Herda et Dertusa ei, quando captae fuerunt, concessit“. Villanueva Viage lit. XIX. 294, Marca Marca Hispanica p. 1357, Aguirre Conc. V. 89, Mansi XXI. 1071, Migne 200 p. 1048. —
